column1: The Pit Room////Ordered a 3 meat dinner plate to sample as this was my first time here. Got brisket
column2: beef sausage and pork ribs as my meat selections. The brisket was amazing
column3: perfectly seasoned and tender. The Czech beef sausage was also good. The ribs were a bit of a let down though
column4: small and dry. I got double mac and cheese as my side. That was pretty good too
